creditline: Gift of Stanley and Lucile Slocum
description: Perhaps illustration for a novel by Sir Walter Scott or the Bible. Squared for transfer.
inscription:
Inscription

lower center verso: [13; in pencil (Late 19th or early 20th c. hand) lower verso: [Sketch for an altar piece painted in oil]
medium: Graphite and brown pencil on paper
portfolio: From One of forty pencil drawings from a sketchbook.
title: Christ with Kneeling Woman In Landscape (Noli me tangere?)
